rhemai.author: Herodotos
rhemai.greek: ἀπικομένους δὲ τούς Φοίνικας ἐς δὴ τὸ Ἄργος τοῦτο διατίθεσθαι τὸν φόρτον
translations: The Phoenicians came to Argos, and set out their cargo

rhemai.author: Herodotos
translations: This is the display of the inquiry of Herodotus of Halicarnassus
This is the display of the inquiry of Herodotos of Halicarnassos
